text: And If We Should Meet Again () is a 1947 German drama film directed by Hans Müller and starring Paul Dahlke, Käthe Haack.Rentschler p. 345 It was part of the post-war group of Rubble films. ==Cast== == References == ==Bibliography== * == External links == * Category:1947 films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Hans Müller Category:German black-and-white films Category:German drama films Category:1947 drama films
title: And If We Should Meet Again
